headline: It’s beautiful!
reviewBody: Thank you so much for the beautiful urn. You guys did a great job! Now, I can rest a little easier knowing that my beloved husband is home here with me. Thank you again!

headline: Beautiful marble urn
reviewBody: Beautiful marble urn. A very suitable & elegant container for my wife's ashes.

headline: Perfect Urn for Husband, Father, & Grandfather
reviewBody: When my husband passed away his wish was to be cremated.  My children and I honored his request.  We wanted a special urn for his ashes that represented him, and then my son found Oaktree Memorials.  Our search was over as the urn we selected could not have been more perfect.  The grain in the wood top represented my husbands love of woodwork, and the different paths he took in life.  The engraving was a beautiful addition commemorating a loving husband, father and grandfather. In such a difficult time Oaktree Memorials provided ease of ordering, and reliable service.  Thank you so much, and highest praises for your outstanding company.

headline: Lenox Urn - Black Walnut
reviewBody: My Dad recently passed and I was having the hardest time finding an urn that was good enough and fitting for the type of man he is. I came across Oaktree Memorials and saw the Lenox urn in black walnut. It felt exactly like something my Dad would like. After learning about the company I knew this was the right choice. And was it ever. It’s even more beautiful in person. The quality of the materials and craftsmanship is stunning. My order was processed and shipped without delay and I know my Dad would approve. It’s a hard thing to find an urn for someone who is so loved, so it’s nice to find a company who cares and takes pride in their products.

headline: The necklace was perfect to carry my…
reviewBody: The necklace was perfect to carry my sister close to my heart

headline: Errors Righted Beautifully
reviewBody: I had a specific urn in mind but couldn't find exactly what I was looking for so I ordered a different urn - size large. It took a very long time to ship and when it did, it was the small urn which I thought was for a dog. I sent a very angry email off and was met with compassion and sincere apologies. The large urn wasn't available for several more weeks so I asked for a refund. Ashley offered me either a refund or a discount on one of four urns that were available immediately and the fourth urn was EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED ORIGINALLY! It shipped immediately and it's perfect. Ashely was the amazing human who dealt with my grief rage beautifully. The entire ordeal had the happiest ending during such a sad time. Oaktree really turned it around. I'm so appreciative.

headline: Wonderful and Beautiful
reviewBody: The website was so easy to navigate.  Having an option for our daughter to place some of her husbands ashes into a beautiful flower base was wonderful.  He used to pick wild flowers for her when they would go hiking or "just because" so this vase is extra special to her.  The vase is beautiful and it arrived in 3 days.

headline: No only is my order beautiful but the…
reviewBody: No only is my order beautiful but the customer service is amazing! I had a question and the customer service team turned around and answer and quick fix in no time. Thank you!!!

headline: The urn is beautiful
reviewBody: The urn is beautiful. My only complaint is the engraving is so small on the top. It is not proportional with the size of the lid. Aesthetically the name should be bit larger.

headline: Final product and Max wonderful BUT...
reviewBody: I was very frustrated in the amount of time it took to finalize my engraving with Ashley.  At one point, I truly thought I had been scammed.  However, once Max (one of the owners) got involved, the process moved very swiftly and efficiently as it should have from the beginning.  Max was very understanding and attentive and always got back to me right away.  The final product was beautiful and of great quality and exactly as pictured on the website.  I am very satisfied with the final product.  If I could deal with Max directly, I would definitely purchase again from Oaktree.

headline: Beautiful Custom piece!
reviewBody: Great product!  It custom made so patience is a must.  Friendly back and forth chats with customer service made this transaction easier.  I am very pleased with the final product.  Shipping is unbelievable.  They packed the urn worthy for a Rolex!

headline: Perfect Cremation Necklace
reviewBody: I ordered a cremation necklace with engravings to remember my beloved dog, Lucy, and to keep her by my heart always.  It turned out more beautiful and perfect than I imagined.  Now I will always be able to have part of her close to my heart, which helps with the pain of losing her.  Anytime I'm sad or missing her I just reach up and touch my pendant, and it brings me comfort.  They were a wonderful company to deal with and I would recommend them to anyone that is looking for a way to memorialize their loved one, be it 2 or 4-legged.  Very affordable, quick to send and receive the item, and exceptionally well made.  Thank you so much.

headline: Urns are exactly was expected...just…
reviewBody: Urns are exactly was expected...just larger, but not a problem  Packed with great care.

headline: This was the most difficult purchase I…
reviewBody: This was the most difficult purchase I have ever had to make. Fortunately my search led me to Oaktree, where I found the one and only urn befitting of my Heart Dog, Bella Maria.  The Ludlow in Pink Urn is exquisitely crafted and presented beautifully.   Their Customer Support treated me like family and helped guide me on this journey.  I am so grateful for Oaktree.

headline: Modern, and Perfect!
reviewBody: My sweet 15 year old pit bull meant the world to our family. She was our emotional support without judgement, our stinky snuggle bug. When she suddenly passed I was beside myself and not even close to ready for her ashes to be spread. This memorial gave me the chance to keep her near me and put a little cactus on top (because she was always stepping in them and never learned her lesson). Thank You for having a beautiful modern Urn that keeps her with me everyday.

headline: Forever in and ON our Hearts!
reviewBody: My dearest dad passed away 12/20/2021. For her service in January 2022-we ordered three beautiful cremains pendants from Oaktree. Two hearts, and one tear drop. They are GORGEOUS, and I was so stunned with the personal attention, kindness and care of my order, that I reached out to thank Oaktree. Max personally responded and allowed me to tell my story of our dear dad. It has been 18 months since he passed, and our pendants are worn nearly daily. By far this is the classiest, KINDEST company of you are looking for personal attention, and a beautiful keepsake. Thank you so much for helping us memorialize our dad! Much Love and Appreciation always!

headline: The urn I ordered was too small and…
reviewBody: The urn I ordered was too small and Oaktree promptly sent me a new one, no questions asked. The customer service representative was so kind and understanding. This company really showed compassion at such a difficult time. On top of that, my daughters urn turned out so beautiful and simple, just as I wanted it. I proudly have it displayed in my living room and get many compliments.

headline: Oaktree Memorials… highly recommended
reviewBody: Oaktree Memorials was fantastic. Miles was so supportive and helpful. The urn is beautiful and exactly what I wanted!  After messaging them regarding the engraving, I received a quick response and it turned out perfect! Highly recommend their service and quality of work!

headline: Beautiful, but one small con…
reviewBody: It’s beautiful, and came in so quickly.  I really wish the lid to the bottom part (for the ashes) was more secure.  I’m going to try to super glue it down so it can’t be easily opened or accessed, but I wish that was something that was considered in the original design.

headline: F***** up marketing on shipping boxes!! THEY DO NOT CARE ABOUT YOU!!
reviewBody: How dare you exploit folks with your outrageous use of words on the shipping packaging!! To have a box get delivered that thanks ME for choosing YOU to hold the remains in is absolutely CLASSLESS and absurdly indiscreet. Not only do I get the joy of that outside packaging, but every layer of packaging inside echos the same soulless, morbid appreciation. Losing a loved one, be it a pet or human, is f****** tragic. I don’t need the local mail people, my neighbors, or any people handling the package along the way to see those words. YOU ARE TRIGGERING PEOPLE during an already stressful and sad time in an already stressful and messed up world. I wouldn’t recommend you to anyone I cared about…heck, I wouldn’t recommend you to my worst enemy. No one deserves to feel that way at a time they already feel so sad and lost. HOW DARE YOU!!!

headline: Products are beautifully crafted and customer service is exceptional.
reviewBody: Products are beautifully crafted and extremely high quality. Also, customer service was outstanding —- there was one small detail wrong with my order and when I called, they immediately took responsibility for the error and sent me a replacement. 100% would use their services again.

headline: Perfect
reviewBody: Urn arrived promptly, packed well and boxed beautifully. The urn itself is better than pictured. The colors are bright and glossy, and it isn’t heavy. It’s exactly what I was looking for. I wanted an urn that didn’t look like one and found it. I’m very pleased with my purchase.

headline: The urn is beautiful and everything…
reviewBody: The urn  is beautiful and everything was everything I expected in helping honoring my son. This was my second one our family got and not experiences were great

headline: Amazingly beautiful piece for our loved one
reviewBody: The item was absolutely beautiful and shipped even faster than advertised. The engraving panel was shipped unattached which ultimately gave us all control over where it goes. The compartment for belongings is such a nice thought. The piece came smelling of fabric paint or something, but aired it out for a day really helped relieve that.

headline: It’s a beautful urn
reviewBody: It’s a beautful urn. The top part is about 4” in circumference so a small plant or flowers will do. But, the seal for the bottom part is not quite as tight as we’d have liked. Therefore, we put ashes in a baggie to prevent any spillage. This doesn’t fit an entire human remains. Only a part of it.

headline: Customer service was outstanding
reviewBody: Customer service was outstanding. Items purchased were beautiful. Delivery was very quick. Thank you OakTree for making the hardest period in my life a little bit easier!

headline: White Small Vega Vase
reviewBody: The urn (Vega Vase) we got was very pretty.  We liked that its uniqueness.  The engraving was very sweet and simple.  I wish we could have put a small engraving on the backside of the wood.  I also didn't look at the measurements of the vase very well so I didn't realize how big it would be even though we purchased the small.  I am happy it's holding our baby girl and sitting nicely on our dresser in our room.

headline: very understanding
reviewBody: very understanding, they manage to do all the funerals quickly with no delays and all the guests were so impressed thanks guys

headline: Will Always Return
reviewBody: Every time I've ordered has been easy & wonderful while offering a certain sense of peace afterwards. Death is a stressful experience overall, but Oaktree simplifies one of the most important aspects - paying respect to your lost loved ones. I actually had trouble with a coupon code on my last purchase & the team handled it swiftly! Really appreciated that.

headline: I have been looking for the perfect urn…
reviewBody: I have been looking for the perfect urn for my son for almost 2 years. When I came across your website I was impressed with your designs! Max was also very helpful and prompt with my questions.

headline: Highly recommended
reviewBody: The sign of a great company is one that's dedicated to providing high quality service as well as excellent products. The kind people at Oaktree Memorials understand the importance of getting things right for their grieving customers, and they are exceptional in the way they do business. Without reservation, I highly recommend them.

headline: Beautiful necklace
reviewBody: Beautiful necklace. I LOVE the design and I love that the necklace chain connects to both sides of the pendant so the chain can’t get moved backwards. It’s a gorgeous piece and I I love it!!

headline: Italian wood chest
reviewBody: My funeral chest arrived as scheduled and is exquisite in every detail - from the very high polished finish, to tiny screws that are perfectly sized to be secure, to the interior mahogany lining that smells of natural wood.  I also appreciate the beautiful packaging scented with lavender (I think?) and the cloth sack.  How remarkably thoughtful of Oaktree to be mindful of the tender feelings of your clients. Thanks so much for all the caring steps. MSM

headline: Beautiful, Kind and helpful experience
reviewBody: My sister and I came across this site because we fell in love with a beautiful urn for my father with a memorial candle in it. The customer service experience was amazing. Everyone I spoke to was incredibly nice. I wanted something specific engraved in it, they accommodated everything, took the time for the proper placement so it looked the most pristine. This was a very nice and easy process for such a difficult time. Thank you so much.

headline: Great Products, Amazing Care and Support
reviewBody: Oaktree was such a wonderful company to work with after the death of my mom. I was, of course, navigating the hardest moment in my life when I was looking through their products, and their empathy throughout was something I’ll never forget. The product I originally ordered was going to be delayed, and they were quick to reach out and communicate my options. They also included the sweetest handwritten note with the packaging to convey their condolences, and I felt so cared for. And the two products I purchased (an urn with a vase and a necklace) are both gorgeous—quality pieces that will last a lifetime.

headline: Great Customer Service, Beautiful Urn
reviewBody: Oaktree Memorials gave me a beautiful place to keep my Dad's ashes. They also helped me quickly resolve an issue I had with the lid of my urn. I would highly recommend them and thank them for everything.

headline: Great service
reviewBody: The service was great and quick delivery. They graciously and quickly corrected the plaque for some spelling mistake I made.Everyone marvels at the beauty, quality of the wood and craftsmanship of the urn. The duodecahedron polygon is such an “oddball”, just like my beloved wife.

headline: Amazing product
reviewBody: Amazing product! Perfectly executed what I wanted abd with ease. Very friendly and excellent customer service. Highly recommend!!!

headline: Beautiful urn
reviewBody: Beautiful urn.  I get to put fresh flowers in and it makes me smile - he's always making me happy, no matter where he is.  A lovely way to remember your loved one.

headline: The search was immediately over! I searched and searched for the right…
reviewBody: I searched and searched for the right final resting spot for my dad—a devout nature and wood crafted everything lover. Oaktree was a beacon in my search and from my first distressed outreach to them needing his urn to arrive sooner than their posted delivery estimates thru delivery, the team was incredible and responsive to our needs. Wonderful experience and stunning, authentic and high quality resting place for dad and all of us to remember him for years to come.

headline: Beautiful product and excellent service.
reviewBody: The ordering process was simple and the urn was delivered to the funeral home in a timely manner. My family and I are grateful for the stately options available through Oaktree Memorials, as we couldn’t find anything that we liked elsewhere. Despite this sad time, the urn is very well built and attractive, and we are very happy with it.

headline: Beautiful urn, great service
reviewBody: The urn was more beautiful than I anticipated. Customer service was great, they walked me through the engraving options.

headline: Vega Vase Urn is Stunning
reviewBody: My parents passed unexpectedly in a car wreck in January 2023. As they were together 47 years, even in their final moments, my sister and I wanted them together. The funeral home “commingled” their ashes and I wanted an urn that didn’t resemble an urn at all. My parents were such fun-loving and bright people that had a tremendous impact on so many. Neither of them wanted people to be sad so I wanted an urn that was bright and cheery.  The Vega Vase Urn in Blue - Medium is absolutely beautiful. My Mom would love the color! The bottom portion holds a decent amount of ashes whereas the top portion/vase can hold a decent bouquet of flowers. The vase is easy to clean as well. Many people have complimented on it and when I tell them it’s actually part urn, they love it even more.

headline: A beautiful resting place
reviewBody: My dad passed April 14, 2023 unexpectedly. This Urn was the first one I came across that I felt would truly represent him. It came in the post extremely quick. It was packaged and shipped with love. The quality is beyond my expectations and the engraving is beautiful. You can rest assured your loved one will have a beautiful place for their body to rest. I’ve never bought an urn before but I can’t imagine it can get any better.

headline: Amazingly kind and respectful service
reviewBody: Amazingly kind and respectful service, they went out of their way to make sure my urn  matched my wife’s urn. Very happy with quality and the care I have received.

headline: The urn is beautiful
reviewBody: The urn is beautiful. It arrived quicker than I thought it would AND the packaging was perfect. It arrived safely and was beautifully presented. I selected the rainbow wooden urn and it fits my oldest child’s personality and I see it every day and I know that they would have been happy with the choice. Thank you.

headline: A beautiful memorial - Work of Art
reviewBody: The urn is beautiful and arrived earlier than expected. The product is exactly as described and worth every dollar.

headline: I could select the favorite with preview
reviewBody: Since I chose the wooden urn which is unique and different, I asked if I could select from a few options. The customer service lady (Ashley) sent me pictures from all different sides twice so I could purchase with confidence that I selected the best one. The urn arrived was so beautiful and we can't be happier with our choice. Thank you.

headline: Lenox Urn in Poplar
reviewBody: My family ordered the Lenox in Poplar to hold our 15 year old son and brother's remains. While I don’t wish this purchase on anyone ever, I’m very grateful for the urn options and service from Oaktree.  All the other traditional urn options from other retailers were just flat out not an option for our child who was so full of life, love, fun, and bravery. We needed a modern urn for our amazing kid. Thank you Oaktree Memorials.

headline: Really likes the unique design of the…
reviewBody: Really likes the unique design of the urn that we picked out. Spoke with customer service on two separate occasions, and both were very cordial and professional. Appreciate the quick turnaround, as well.

headline: Beautiful product Exceptional Customer Service
reviewBody: Oaktree customer service is exceptional.  They are very responsive, professional, and compassionate.  Our urn is beautifully made, exquisite craftsmanship and quality with a sleek, modern design.  My dad would be so pleased with our choice for him.

headline: Beautiful
reviewBody: Beautiful.  High quality with fast delivery.  I thought my options wouldBe limited to a typical urn.  However, a family member found oak treeMemorials.  My husbands family and will divide his ashes but got matching urns.  His family will bury one urn, and as his wife I am keeping mine in our home.  Brings me peace and love the warmth of the tea candle.

headline: The urn was absolutely gorgeous
reviewBody: The urn was absolutely gorgeous, and Oaktree worked closely with us to customize the top carving, which was quite detailed.  Quick responses, attention to all detail -- really top notch customer service.  And a beautiful product.  I will use them again.

headline: We are very pleased with your service
reviewBody: We are very pleased with your service. The communication has been excellent and extremely responsive. The box itself is beautiful and made to the highest quality. The choice of wood for it is excellent. Thank you for doing a wonderful job with this difficult matter. Appreciate very much!

headline: Decorative urn
reviewBody: I am pleased with the beautiful urn purchased for my husband. The craftsmanship, size and style reflect his aura. The process was extremely easy as was the fast delivery. Keep up the great work and service!

headline: I ordered an urn for our dog's ashes
reviewBody: I ordered an urn for our dog's ashes. It arrived safely, in a timely manner, and is beautiful. Thank you for your great service!

headline: Well designed
reviewBody: I’m happy with the product - the Hudson urn — and everything arrived on time for funerary services. I wish it was a little heavier, but the aesthetic is still nice

headline: Seeing the awe-inspiring quality took my break away - thank you,m the website to the…
reviewBody: Everything from the website to the ordering process to the customer service team (most notably Ashley) - the Oaktree team is truly fantastic.The craftsmanship is beyond compare and receiving two deliveries on the same day made the experience of opening the Oaktree Memorials that much more impactful.The care in the packaging, as well as the experience of seeing the awe-inspiring quality took my break away. Thank you

headline: We could not be more pleased with the…
reviewBody: We could not be more pleased with the beautiful box urn we chose for our mother. It is very well made and absolutely beautiful. It arrived quickly and was obviously packaged with great care. Thank you Oaktree!

headline: Stop browsing!! Shop with Oaktree!!
reviewBody: The quality of your products is amazing. Your customer service is above and beyond.  You follow up with every order.  It’s a pleasure to shop with Oaktree Memorials!

headline: Extremely helpful
reviewBody: Extremely helpful, responsive, and knowledgeable. Answered any questions I had  with compassion and care. Would definitely recommend.

headline: Perfection
reviewBody: The urn is exquisite.  The craftsmanship is of the finest quality. The wood grain is stunning.  I wanted a piece worthy of my husband's life and this piece exceeded my wish.  It's a work of art I can proudly display with no   hint of its contents.

headline: Quality
reviewBody: Exactly what I wanted.  I got The Parker Candle Urn. I didn't want something that screamed URN and this is PERFECT.  The quality is amazing and the engraving is perfect.

headline: Customer Service
reviewBody: Oaktree's customer service was Wonderful. There was something wrong with my original urn, so they sent me one that was working perfectly.

headline: Caring company that provides a…
reviewBody: Caring company that provides a beautiful product.

headline: "Exceptional Customer Service in a Moment of Grief: A Heartfelt Tribute to My Husband"
reviewBody: I would like to take a moment to express my deepest gratitude towards Max and the incredible team who went above and beyond to provide me with exceptional customer service during such a challenging time. Losing my beloved husband on November 1st, 2021 was a heart-wrenching experience, and I wanted to find a way to honor him that truly reflected our shared love for Star Wars.Living in Trinidad and Tobago, I was unsure if I could find a place that could create a custom-made pendant featuring Yoda, our favorite Star Wars character, as a representation of my husband. However, when I stumbled upon your store, Max and the team made the impossible happen. Their willingness to go the extra mile and fulfill my unique request truly touched my heart.Not only was the final product of remarkable quality, but the packaging itself exuded a sense of care and attention to detail. From the moment I received the package, I could tell that a lot of thought had gone into ensuring the presentation was perfect. However, what truly made the experience unforgettable was the personalized, handwritten note that accompanied the pendant. It brought tears to my eyes to know that someone, even though we had never met, cared enough to acknowledge my loss and extend their heartfelt condolences.Throughout the process, Max and the team kept me well-informed and involved, providing regular updates that reassured me that my precious memento was being handled with utmost care. Their efficiency and responsiveness demonstrated a level of professionalism that is truly commendable.In this world where genuine care and empathy can often feel scarce, I am immensely grateful to have found such a compassionate and dedicated team. I wholeheartedly recommend their services to anyone seeking a personalized, meaningful tribute or memento. Max and the team, thank you from the bottom of my heart for providing me with not only a cherished pendant but also a sense of comfort during this difficult time. Your exceptional customer service will forever hold a special place in my heart.RegardsReshma Singh-Manoo

headline: Excellent customer support
reviewBody: Oaktree Memorials customer service is incredible. They respond so quickly and made the return/exchange process so easy and painless. I appreciate this immensely at such a sensitive time. Thank you guys!

headline: Mothers Urn
reviewBody: Great product! I have yellow roses on the vase urn for my mother, they were her favorite

headline: The Craftsmanship and Beauty
reviewBody: Beautiful company, beautiful craftsmanship. Thank you for this forever piece of love and honor.

headline: Beautiful product
reviewBody: Beautiful product and I when needed to make a last-minute change and they were very accommodating.

headline: Everything about my experience with…
reviewBody: Everything about my experience with Oaktree was exceptional. Their customer service is fantastic and their products are breathtaking.

headline: Perfection
reviewBody: I cannot say enough about the quality of Oaktree Memorials from start to finish - especially at such a difficult and sensitive time in life. I was looking for the perfect container, something that would be commensurate with the kind of individual who my husband was.  As soon as I saw the simple elegance and beauty of the Hudson warm brown, I knew this was the one.  I kept looking just to make sure there wasn't something else that would surpass it and after looking online at hundreds of urns, and from what I was reading from reviews, I knew that this was THE one, as well as having the kind of people I'd like to do business with.Ashley was superlative in every way - kind, helpful, knowledgeable and very detail oriented so as to make sure everything was answered and then done exactly as wanted and even more.  The packaging was perfect, so respectfully and thoroughly chosen - you can sense the heart that these owners have put into their company having been in this same place earlier when not finding what they were looking for.The urn is exquisitely beautiful.  Outstanding in every way.  The compassion that this Company has along with their standard of excellence in customer care, presentation, then the superlative workmanship in the urn itself is most appreciated and gives me true comfort in getting something so significant, so exactly right.

headline: Beautiful quality urn
reviewBody: Beautiful quality urn, fast and friendly service. I had it engraved and it turned out beautifully.

headline: Very happy
reviewBody: Very very happy with our purchase of the urn and customer service we were provided!

headline: Great service and quick delivery
reviewBody: Great service and quick delivery. I'm from the UK and order arrived safely packaged and very quickly!

headline: Worth the wait
reviewBody: I had to contact the company after 4 weeks without a word. It arrived shortly after that. I am happy with the urn and pleased at the comments it gets. Worth the wait.

headline: My experience was very easy and smooth
reviewBody: My experience was very easy and smooth. No issues and easy to get in contact with someone on the phone or via email. And I love my wooden urn!

headline: Good quality but overpriced
reviewBody: Good quality and quick shipping but pretty overpriced

headline: Beautiful selection at great prices
reviewBody: Beautiful selection at great prices. Very fast shipping.

headline: Amazing product
reviewBody: Amazing product. A gift for my sister and she absolutely loves it.

headline: Beautiful, quality merchandise
reviewBody: Merchandise came quickly, easy to order, and top quality

headline: Beautiful craftmanship.
reviewBody: Beautiful craftmanship.Very rich looking.

headline: This necklace is perfect
reviewBody: This necklace is perfect. I wear it everyday only take it off to shower

headline: Wonderful quality product
reviewBody: Wonderful quality product, great customer service.  Very pleased.  I would definitely recommend this company.

headline: Great product
reviewBody: Great product! Wonderful tribute to my mother!

headline: I love the urn for my beloved
reviewBody: I love the urn for my beloved, Hunter. The Vega Vase looks great.

headline: Unique products - something really special
reviewBody: Fantastic customer service, quality of products second to none and fast delivery. Highly recommended.

headline: Incredible product and experience
reviewBody: From the product to customer service, Oaktree is excellent. Thank you for creating something so meaningful and beautiful.

headline: Beautiful necklace
reviewBody: Loved the necklace and it was sent quickly.

headline: Elegant Product
reviewBody: A very beautiful and well crafted urn.  Worth the cost.

headline: Beautiful product and timely delivery!
reviewBody: Beautiful product and timely delivery!

headline: Beautiful Urn
reviewBody: I bought an urn und We love it. The service was very friendly and helpful…Thanks for all

headline: High Quality Necklace
reviewBody: Exactly as shown in photo.  High quality.

headline: Perfect
reviewBody: Delivery was fast and the Urn is absolutely beautiful

headline: Great product and received in timely…
reviewBody: Great product and received in timely manner.

headline: Great product and fast service
reviewBody: Great product and fast service

headline: A wonderful experience from start to…
reviewBody: A wonderful experience from start to finish.

headline: Great quality urn and shipped to me on…
reviewBody: Great quality urn and shipped to me on time.

headline: Uniqueness of product.
reviewBody: Uniqueness of product.

headline: Beautiful wood urn
reviewBody: Beautiful wood urn
